channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Banking Payments
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Banking Payments

item.title: CVE-2023-21915|2024-08-02T09:51:51.547Z -- oracle%20corporation -- banking%20payments
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Banking Payments product of Oracle Financial Services Applications (component: Book/Internal Transfer). Supported versions that are affected are 14.5, 14.6 and 14.7. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Banking Payments. Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than the attacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Oracle Banking Payments accessible data as well as unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Banking Payments accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.6 (Confidentiality and Integrity impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:N).
